ComicInfo.Title: Here in Manhattan, Chapter Two: Idyll or Nightmare
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Gargoyles have awakened from their stone sleep – but will it be in time to save Maggie the Cat and her unborn mutate child from Thailog and Sevarius? Plus, don’t miss the return of Dominic Dracon!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-27 02:42:48. [CVDB965230]
